soundcard_name.description: The name of the soundcard being used in the calibration.
soundcard_name.title: Soundcard Name

fs.description: The sampling frequency of the soundcard (Hz).
fs.title: Fs

com_port.description: The COM number the soundcard corresponds to in the computer used for the calibration. The string should be of the format "COM?", in which "?" is the COM number.
com_port.title: Com Port

fs.description: The sampling frequency of the soundcard (Hz).
fs.title: Fs

soundcard_id.description: The ID of the soundcard. If the soundcard is a Harp device, the ID should be of the format "V?.? X????", in which "?" are numbers.
soundcard_id.title: Soundcard Id

audio_amp_id.description: The ID of the audio amplifier. If the audio amplifier is a Harp device, the ID should be of the format "V?.? X????", in which "?" are numbers.
audio_amp_id.title: Audio Amp Id

is_harp.description: Indicates whether the soundcard being calibrated is a Harp device or not.
is_harp.title: Is Harp

speaker_id.description: The ID number of the speaker being calibrated (StC).
speaker_id.title: Speaker Id

setup_id.description: The ID number of the setup.
setup_id.title: Setup Id

fs_adc.description: The sampling frequency of the ADC (Hz).
fs_adc.title: Fs Adc

mic_factor.description: The conversion factor of the microphone (V/Pa).
mic_factor.title: Mic Factor
